name: Let's Survive
description:
Team Hunter is developing an interactive novel (tentative title - Let's Survive) which takes place in a fictional town called "Central City". The protagonist is a fresh graduate looking to start work in a new role in ONE Tower. ONE is a conglomerate dealing from pharmaceuticals to logistics and military defence. A key part of their income is from the development of vaccines in the current pandemic.

During the course of the protagonist's work, strange activities starts to occur. The rise of vigilantism and occults. Protestors defying logic just to be part of some activism. Central City seems to have been a magnet for freaks.

But all hope is lost when a crazy hacker tried to conceive a plan that will fast forward an apocalypse. The war against God, as he would've called it. The protagonist, and his friends need to make life-changing decisions. People will die, and the protagonist's choices matter.

-------------------------------------------------

DEVELOPER'S NOTICE
Last updated: 8th December 2021

This is a VERY EARLY prototype of the game.

This game is a text-based game which will be free to the public. As the game is being developed, you have the power to shape the direction of this game. Please leave a comment on what you would like to see in this game, and we will try to include it in our next release.

A visual novel version of this game will be developed once we have enough funding and support from both Patreon and itch.io channels. The visual novel is only available to Patreon members, or once it has been released for sale in other platforms, e.g. Steam, Nintendo Switch, etc.

Our Patreon subscription is only $1 per month and you may cancel anytime. Your support means a lot to the development of this project.

Thank you and please enjoy the game.
Team Hunter

For more details, please visit our Patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=65001878

-------------------------------------------------

Current Team

  • Hunter (Coder and Writer)
  • Vacant (Graphic Artist)
  • Vacant (Music Artist)

If you'd like to be part of the team please feel free to direct message us. If you have other skill sets that is not listed above, but want to contribute, do contact us as well.

-------------------------------------------------

Game Versions

  • Patrons:
    • Text-based game
    • Visual novel version (when we have more funding)
  • Public:
    • Text-based game (1 week after Patron's release)

-------------------------------------------------

Genre

  • Fantasy (adapted from mythology, biblical lores, and other known legends)
  • Pandemic / Lockdowns (inspired by the current COVID-19 pandemic)
  • Magic
  • Angels / Demons
  • Personality driven storyline
  • Death

-------------------------------------------------

Game Mechanics

Just like a regular interactive / visual novel, the player needs to make a series of choices. Choices will ultimately shape the main character's personality using MBTI. Some characters and choices will change depending on your personality which continuously changes as you make your choices.

-------------------------------------------------
Community Driven Storyline

At the end of each build, we will gather the feedback from users. Patrons can vote, discuss and share ideas and mechanics on what works, or doesn't. Currently, there are no lewd scenes or storyline. However, if users strongly believe in sexual content to bring out the richness of the story, then we will adjust accordingly.

This is your story, and you can help shape it into a community built game.
